item.title: Ada Blackjack Shop - Bags & Leather Goods
item.description:
Ada Blackjack Shop - Bags & Leather Goods

Ada Blackjack goods are carefully crafted by hand using only the ﬁnest materials and fabrics. Each item is made with great attention to detail and special craftsmanship, essential when making goods that last. The minimal designs are characterized by simplicity, timelessness and durability.

item.title: New Architectural Chairs from ODESD2 - Design Milk
item.description:
New Architectural Chairs from ODESD2 - Design Milk

Sleek and characterized by sharp edges and metallic finishes, Urkainian design bureau ODESD2 presented the E3, E4, and E1. The mini collection of chairs and bar stools are inspired by Japanese culture and fitting for a workspace, dining room, or bar area.

item.title: Barca a motore: Riva's Aquarama - News & Stories at STYLEPARK
item.description:
Barca a motore: Riva's Aquarama - News & Stories at STYLEPARK

Barca a motore: Riva's Aquarama by Thomas Wagner | 26 August 2015 Diva named Riva: To this day, the "Aquarama" is considered the epitome of a Riva boat. Photo © Riva/Ferretti Group Design history has its own razzmatazz. The romantic story goes vaguely as follows: It's 1966.

item.title: Bisiluro: Carlo Mollino and the Damolnar - News & Stories at STYLEPARK
item.description:
Bisiluro: Carlo Mollino and the Damolnar - News & Stories at STYLEPARK

Bisiluro: Carlo Mollino and the Damolnar by Thomas Wagner | 12 August 2015 Mario Dalmonte, Carlo Mollino and Enrico Nardi created in 1955 the "Damolnar", also named "Bisiluro". Photo © Museo Nazionale della Scienza e della Tecnologia, Milano The strangest things of all grow in the machine world.

item.title: Hayden Cox on The Great Discontent
item.description:
Hayden Cox on The Great Discontent

Hayden Cox is an Australian surfboard designer who got into the business of making surfboards at the age of 15 and continues to run his eponymous brand, Haydenshapes, today.
